mapper.update: update payment_transactions set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subscription_id = #{subscriptionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_id = #{invoiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provider = #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provider_txn_id = #{providerTxnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, failure_reason = #{failureReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, paid_at = #{paidAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where payment_transaction_id = #{paymentTransactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select payment_transaction_id, company_id, subscription_id, invoice_id, provider, provider_txn_id, amount, status, failure_reason, created_at, paid_at from payment_transactions where payment_transaction_id = #{paymentTransactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select payment_transaction_id, company_id, subscription_id, invoice_id, provider, provider_txn_id, amount, status, failure_reason, created_at, paid_at from payment_transactions
